title: Invert Mouse (Riot Team PLEASE READ)
body:
Hi,

This game has been moving on for a while now without the option to invert the mouse X & Y axis.
Up until now, I have used 3rd party programs (no longer working) to invert the mouse directions for me.

I understand this is an uncommon issue, but it should not be a hard implementation to add to the game.

Please Riot, add Invert Mouse X&Y options for us proud few!

Otherwise I will be forced off the game :/

Thank you,
HL

replies.body: Hmm, have those programs stopped working as a result of the client security stuff a few patches ago?

Thanks for the quick reply!

Grew up holding the mouse upside-down (father did it). This way you need to use both your thumb and the inside of your palm to click both mouse buttons.
Then I transferred this into playing games like halo where you can switch the inversion.

The third-party programs not working has nothing to do with League updates. They do not work with my version of Windows 10 period.

I can hold the mouse right-side-up and have no problem doing this at work -- but to truly be precise & accurate (for league) I desperately need the option to invert both X&Y.

As I have stated above, this really should not be a hard addition to implement -- and I know there are others out there who could also benefit from this (albeit a minority).
pics or it didn't happen. I'm confused how you would hold it...
It males sense if you consider a wireless mouse. Basically he's just applying pressure to the buttons by pressing the inside of his thumb or outside of his hand to each button.
Why... Would you want to? Seems fishy.
Its not fishy....some people are just backwards and like to scroll up to look down lol.
Not to knock your play-style, but I am also curious why you would want that.

its a preference thing.
Its pretty common in most games, i specifically remember for games involving flight i played ALWAYS having this.
